examples: @SouthwestAir When will the flight resume? I don's see it in the open schedule. :/
@AmericanAir why would I pay $200 to reactivate my points that are only useful for certain flights that aren't even worth $200?
@SouthwestAir My flight was 952, leaving las vegas at 5:40pm, arriving at CHI-MID at 11:00 pm.
@SouthwestAir can I get any kind of update on the delayed flight from Boston to Houston at 7:30? Really need to be back home tonight!
@united in the process of purchasing ticket, when prices changed. unbelievable. #RipOffs #PriceDiscrimination
@united you always surprise me with the awfulness of your airline. You guys suck. #worst
@AmericanAir But Eagle is always Late Flight
“@USAirways: @AnnetteNaif We appreciate the #shoutout for Roberto. DM confirmation code so we can forward ur kind words.” Confirmation code?
@USAirways And also, it's great that you tweet @ complainers, but what about the in-person help when I need it? Robyn F. in Manch = useless.
@united Flight attendant never served me my beverage (tea), and not once checked up on me. What gives? #ua6076 #notcool
@united This link in your tweet goes to someone's internal email -> http://t.co/ZksX79itdN...... Probably one of your 3rd party IT contracts
@JetBlue such a bummer.  But I understand it's a business deal. Thanks for answering me!  Much less sad now.
@SouthwestAir I was under the impression when there is an 8 hour delay in your flight because of equipment failure, compensation is offered?
@AmericanAir @derekc21 , so what would be a file number that works , needs to be 10 characters , email me derek.austin@century21.ca  easier
@united I have already emailed but I didn't know if it was more expedient to contact you here. Please advise. Thanks.
@united was in the air. Just DMd you
@USAirways it's vegas baby who doesn't have a good time in vegas lol
@AmericanAir @Slacksoft_uk I saw an American 767 in old colours at @HeathrowAirport on Saturday! Was surprised to see!

@VirginAmerica Many Thanks for the Follow.
#ourprincess #freyasfund #USA #Bandie 
Looking for Any Help😍
💗🇬🇧💗🇺🇸💗
🎀🌏🎀 http://t.co/UJfS9Zi6kd
@AmericanAir Thank you for the response.  When I book I've tried my AA number and my US Airways number and each time it doesn't pick it up
@JetBlue would you say a delay is more likely? Thanks so much.
@USAirways Well I did miss it. But gate agents had rebooked boarding pass waiting when I landed. Time for lunch & a beverage. Easy cheesy
@JetBlue no, they're too busy being awesome and trying to get us out ASAP. I'll deal.
@SouthwestAir - just got it back about 20 mins ago. Went about 18 hrs w/o it but I appreciate the support. $50 voucher + $50 for essentials.

@united 
I will admit, you've been rather good to me over the years.
You've still got me hooked.
(for now!)
Peace.
@AmericanAir #AmericanView Sweet Home Chicago http://t.co/J6icLV8DTs
@united is #ELP Friendly. #flyerfriendly #united #emb145 #elpaso http://t.co/9mEOzBO4xl
@JetBlue good morning sunshine! #TailfinThursday http://t.co/Nc0ES6e4Lf
@SouthwestAir Thanks! Sent a DM to you. Let me know if oyu need any additional information.
@united I wanna be grand staff
